page.title: 03One Day in l985 (Cont)
page.content: buffet car,sometimes a man comes along the train selling coffee to the passengers, it saves having to carry the hot cups down a moving train. When we arrived we made our way to the ground which is called Mollineaux. As we went through the gate where we had to pay to get in I also bought a programme of the match,Ihave these and have quite a collection now.When we found our seats we did not have to wait long, before the match started there was music playing and the announcer was telling the crowd of any team changes different from the programme. Then the teams came out and Icheered my team like mad.Almost staright away Wolves had scored by half time it was one all, so while the players were having a rest the announcer gave the scores of the other matches being played, Everton was
